name: KR - PHP Web Content Server
short_description: KR is a web content-server based on Apache-PHP-MySql technology who gives to internet programmers some PHP classes semplifying database content access. Elsewere, it gives some admin and user tools to write, hyerarchize and authorize contents. WOW!
